com.ociweb.pronghorn.pipe

Class PipeReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ociweb.pronghorn.pipe.PipeReader

  • public class PipeReader
extends Object
    Public interface for applications desiring to consume data from a FAST feed.
    Author:
    Nathan Tippy

      • tryMoveSingleMessage

        public static boolean tryMoveSingleMessage(Pipe pipeIn,
                                           Pipe pipeOut)
        Copies current message from input ring to output ring. Once copied that message is no longer readable. Message could be read before calling this copy using a low-level look ahead technique. Returns false until the full message is copied. Once called must continue to retry until true is returned or the message will be left in a partial state. NEVER follow this with publish since it has already been done.
        Parameters:
        pipeIn -
        pipeOut -

        Determines if rw is a new message
        Parameters:
        rw - StackStateWalker checked to see if it is a new message
        Returns:
        true if rm is a new message, else false

      • releaseReadLock

        public static int releaseReadLock(Pipe pipe)
        Release the record which has been most recently read. The act of releasing a record/message allows it to now be written over.
        Parameters:
        pipe - The pipe where this message is found.
        Returns:
        The total number of variable length field bytes consumed by this now released message.
